Review Name: Good Product But dont Trust Flipkart Call in Customer Servic Review Description: The product is good....Guess the only downside will be there is no option to swing for left right direction and filter placement is good for me and is easy to clean....Good installation by Mr.Senthil and team. Flipkart Customer service is pathetic because of Poor Knowledge transfer had to call them three times just to get clarity on the Installation Charges as there was an offer going on. Frustated with their Response.
